project_light.item.twilight_ego1: 只有全属性超过 110 的员工才能拿起这把武器（包括饰品加成）。
project_light.item.twilight_ego2: 这把武器会同时造成物理，精神，侵蚀和灵魂伤害（普通伤害，魔法伤害，虚空伤害，目标最大生命值的百分比伤害）。
project_light.item.twilight_ego3: 这把武器每隔一段时间可发起一次特殊攻击。
project_light.item.twilight_ego4: 如果有员工持有这件E.G.O武器，则终末鸟就不会出现。
project_light.item.twilight_ego5: Just like how the ever-watching eyes, the scale that could measure any and all sin, and the beak that could swallow everything protected the peace of the Black Forest...
project_light.item.twilight_ego6: The wielder of this armament may also bring peace as they did.
project_light.item.justitia_ego1: 这把武器每次攻击时会造成5次灵魂伤害（目标最大生命值的百分比伤害）。
project_light.item.justitia_ego2: 这把武器每隔一段时间可发起一次特殊攻击。
project_light.item.justitia_ego3: The person who extracted this E.G.O was the most righteous person in the company.
project_light.item.justitia_ego4: It remembers the scales of the Long Bird that sought not to neglect the weight of even the smallest sins.
project_light.item.justitia_ego5: This weapon may be able to cut not only flesh, but traces of sin as well.
project_light.item.justitia_ego6: ou need not bother to remove the bandages wrapping the equipment; there's a sorrowful past that it does not want to reveal.
project_light.item.justitia_ego7: Hopefully this E.G.O will aid in keeping the peace as it was originally meant to.
project_light.item.smile_ego1: 这把武器的攻击会造成小范围溅射伤害。
project_light.item.smile_ego2: 进行普通攻击时，它会减少被击中单位的移动速度，持续1秒。
project_light.item.smile_ego3: 进行特殊攻击时，它会减少大范围所有非自身单位的移动速度，持续3秒。
project_light.item.smile_ego4: 每击杀一个目标，持有者的生命上限、攻击速度、移动速度均会提高3点，上限为30点，且会在死亡后清除加成。
project_light.item.smile_ego5: 这把武器每隔一段时间可发起一次特殊攻击。
project_light.item.smile_ego6: It has the pale faces of nameless employees and a giant mouth on it.
project_light.item.smile_ego7: Upon striking with the weapon, the monstrous mouth opens wide to devour the target.
project_light.item.censored_ego1: 持有这§4“CENSORED”§r受到伤害时，§4“CENSORED”§r会为其恢复相当于伤害数值40%的生命值和精神值（受到致死伤害时无法触发）。
project_light.item.censored_ego2: 这把武器的普通攻击和面板不同，实际上为2次基础攻击为11点的侵蚀伤害。
project_light.item.censored_ego3: 这把武器每隔一段时间可发起一次特殊攻击。
project_light.item.censored_ego4: §4“CENSORED”§r has the ability to §4“CENSORED”§r, but this is a horrendous sight for those watching.
project_light.item.censored_ego5: Looking at the E.G.O for more than 3 seconds will make you sick.
project_light.item.paradise_lost_ego1: 这把武器攻击时会对范围内所有中立和敌对目标造成伤害。
project_light.item.paradise_lost_ego2: 持有者无法自然恢复生命值和精神值。
project_light.item.paradise_lost_ego3: 发起普通攻击时，这把武器能减少被击中单位的移动速度，同时恢复持有者的生命值和精神值。
project_light.item.paradise_lost_ego4: 发起特殊攻击时，这把武器会生成一个力场盾，减少受到的所有类型的伤害。
project_light.item.paradise_lost_ego5: 这把武器每隔一段时间可发起一次特殊攻击。
project_light.item.paradise_lost_ego6: §o Behold: you stood at the door and knocked, and it was opened to you.§
project_light.item.paradise_lost_ego7: §o I come from the end, and I am here to stay for but a moment.§
project_light.item.paradise_lost_ego8: §o At the same time, I am the one who kindled the light to face the world.§
project_light.item.paradise_lost_ego9: §o My loved ones, who now eagerly desire the greater gifts; I will show you the most excellent way.§
